categories: Category:Battles of the invasion of the Tython system

nodes.text: During the invasion of the Tython system by the Rakata species, the Rakatan Infinite Empire captured the gas giant Obri, one of the Settled Worlds of the system, and its moons. The battle, which occurred between 25,793–25,792 BBY, followed an attack on the space station Fury Station, and the Empire also captured the gas giant Mawr around the same time. From there, the Rakata struck at the planet Tython.
The capture of Obri was first mentioned in the comic book Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 1, a comic book written by John Ostrander and released on November 20, 2013.
